languages.text: "Святейшие {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магосы{/g}... поддались ереси... остальным... отъяли Истинную плоть... на потребу ереси... храни нас... избави нас... избави меня от греха..."

traits.locale_text: "Святейшие магосы... поддались ереси... остальным... отъяли Истинную Плоть... на потребу исчадий... храни нас... избави нас... избави меня от греха..."

languages.text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."
languages.original_text: "Святейшие {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магосы{/g}... поддались ереси... остальным... отъяли Истинную плоть... на потребу ереси... храни нас... избави нас... избави меня от греха..."

traits.locale_text: "The holy magi... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the spawn... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from sin..."

languages.text: “那些神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}……他们向异端屈服……剩下的人……被剥去了实肉……来喂养那些异端……请保佑我们……请拯救我们……将我从过错中拯救出来……”
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: “那些神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}……他们向异端屈服……剩下的人……被剥去了实肉……来喂养那些异端……请保佑我们……请拯救我们……将我从罪恶中拯救出来……”

languages.text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} sagrados... han sucumbido a la herejía... al resto... se nos extirpó nuestra verdadera carne... para alimentar a dicha herejía... Protéjanos... libérenos... libérenos del error...».
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} sagrados... han sucumbido a la herejía... al resto... se nos extirpó nuestra verdadera carne... para alimentar a dicha herejía... Protéjanos... libérenos... libérenos del pecado...».

languages.text: 「聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}…異端に敗れ…残りは…真なる肉体を、剥ぎ取られ…異端の餌に…お守りくだ、さい…どうか、解放を…この罪から…」
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}…異端に敗れ…残りは…真なる肉体を、剥ぎ取られ…異端の餌に…お守りくだ、さい…どうか、解放を…この罪から…」

languages.text: "Die heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g} ... erlagen der Ketzerei ... die übrigen ... wurden ihres Wahren Fleischs beraubt ... um die Ketzerei zu nähren ... Bewahrt uns ... erlöst uns ... erlöst mich von jedem Irrtum ..."
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: "Die heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g} ... erlagen der Ketzerei ... die übrigen ... wurden ihres Wahren Fleischs beraubt ... um die Ketzerei zu nähren ... Bewahrt uns ... erlöst uns ... erlöst mich von der Sünde ..."

languages.text: « Les saints {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g}... ont succombé à l'hérésie... tous les autres... ont été dépouillés de leur Vraie Chair... pour nourrir l'hérésie... Préservez-nous... délivrez-nous... délivrez-moi de l'erreur... »
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: « Les saints {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g}... ont succombé à l'hérésie... tous les autres... ont été dépouillés de leur Vraie Chair... pour nourrir l'hérésie... Préservez-nous... délivrez-nous... délivrez-moi du péché... »

languages.text: "Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magoslar{/g}... Sapkınlığa yenildiler... Kalanlar... Sapkınlığı beslemek için... Salt Suretlerinden sıyrıldılar. Bizi koru... Bizi kurtar... Beni yanılmaktan kurtar..."
languages.original_text: "The holy {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... they succumbed to heresy... the rest... were stripped of their True Flesh... to feed the heresy... Preserve us... deliver us... deliver me from erring..."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magi{/g}... Sapkınlığa yenildiler... Kalanlar... Sapkınlığı beslemek için... Salt Suretlerinden sıyrıldılar. Bizi koru... Bizi kurtar... Beni yanılmaktan kurtar..."
